casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vernon Ray TABOR. No. 248P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Sam Currin, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of November 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
